Name: Data mining 3
About the game: Data Mining 3 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle. The player's goal is to collect all data files, avoiding obstacles and traps, after which the previously closed pass will open to pass the level. In Data Mining 3: - 50 levels - Explosions - Traps - Portals - Colorful art - Cool Soundtrack - Achievements
